content: end of round repeat these 2 rnds until the total number of stitches has been reduced to 72 stitches 19 rnds foot continue knitting sole stitches and working the top of the sock in waffle rib pattern for 51 rnds from beginning of sole total number of rnds will be 70 knit plain for an additional 10 rnds total 80 rnds toe round 1 knit 15 k2tog k1 pm k1 ssk knit 30 k2tog k1 pm k1 ssk knit 15 round 2 knit all stitches repeat these 2 rnds until there are 24 total stitches left arrange stitches so that there are 12 stitches evenly distributed on 2 needles finish toe using kitchener stitch make second sock to match the first abbreviations used k knit k2tog knit 2 together mm millimeter p purl p2tog purl 2 together pm place marker round round s slip ssk slip slip knit st s stitch es this pattern is copyright protected ©carolyn a ferneau 06/2011 all rights reserved http //knittingtipsonline com this pattern is for your personal non commercial use only
